record.title: COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES RULES OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, in accordance with rule XXVI, paragraph 2, of the Standing Rules of the Senate, I submit the rules governing the procedure of the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, which the committee adopted earlier today, for publication in the Congressional Record.
I ask unanimous consent that they be printed in the RECORD.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
